title: The internal enclosing walls of staircase shall be of brick or R
clause_text: The internal enclosing walls of staircase shall be of brick or R.C.C. construction with a fire resistance of not less than two hours. All

source_pdf.text_snippet: The internal enclosing walls of staircase shall be of brick or R.C.C. construction with a fire resistance of not less than two hours. All
